course.title: Introduction to Excel
course.description: MS Excel is the most popular program for working with tables. In this course we talk about simple data analysis methods, which your employees can use in MS Excel.

course.title: Introduction to PowerPoint
course.description: MS PowerPoint is an app for creating presentations. We will explain how to work with PowerPoint effectively. This course will show your employees how to create good slides.
